effects: Increase ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 200% for 3 turns to caster
Reduce damage taken by 30% to caster for 3 turns
Restore 6000 (+15x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to caster
Restore 20 (+0.2x, Heal) MP split over 3 turns to caster
name: Complete Awakening
Complete Awakening
完全覺醒
완전 각성
Éveil complet
Vollständiges Erwachen
Despertar completo
desc_short: Consume own LB gauge to boost own ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR, reduce damage taken for self, and gradually restore HP and MP
消耗自身極限技槽提高自身攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值+減輕對自身的傷害+持續恢復HPMP
사용자의 LB 게이지를 소비하여 사용자의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승+사용자가 받는 피해량 감소+HP와 MP 서서히 회복
Consomme la jauge de limite du lanceur pour augmenter son ATT, DEF, MAGIE et PSY, réduit les dégâts subis par le lanceur et restaure progressivement ses PV et PM
Verbraucht eigenen LImitmeter, um eigenen ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY zu erhöhten + reduziert selbst erhaltenen Schaden und regeneriert allmählich LP/MP.
Consume la barra de EL propia para aumentar ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP del usuario, reducir el daño que se recibe y recuperar poco a poco la VIT  y los PM
